title: Login page not loading

description: JavaScript fetch call takes too long to return results.

description: UI does not refresh after state change until reload.

title: Image upload not working
description: Profile picture upload fails due to validation issue.

title: Session timeout not working
description: User sessions remain active beyond expiry time.
